entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
